verses.verse: Now Sarai <WH8297> Abram's <WH87> wife <WH802> bore <WH3205> him no <WH3808> children: and she had an handmaid, <WH8198> an Egyptian, <WH4713> whose name <WH8034> was Hagar. <WH1904>

And Sarai <WH8297> said <WH559> to Abram, <WH87> Behold <WH2009> now, <WH4994> the LORD <WH3068> has restrained <WH6113> me from bearing: <WH3205> I pray <WH4994> you, go <WH935> in to my maid; <WH8198> it may <WH194> be that I may obtain <WH1129> children <WH1129> by her. And Abram <WH87> listened <WH8085> to the voice <WH6963> of Sarai. <WH8297>

And Sarai <WH8297> Abram's <WH87> wife <WH802> took <WH3947> Hagar <WH1904> her maid <WH8198> the Egyptian, <WH4713> after <WH7093> Abram <WH87> had dwelled <WH3427> ten <WH6235> years <WH8141> in the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> and gave <WH5414> her to her husband <WH376> Abram <WH87> to be his wife. <WH802>
And he went <WH935> in to Hagar, <WH1904> and she conceived: <WH2029> and when she saw <WH7200> that she had conceived, <WH2029> her mistress <WH1404> was despised <WH7043> in her eyes. <WH5869>

And Sarai <WH8297> said <WH559> to Abram, <WH87> My wrong <WH2555> be on you: I have given <WH5414> my maid <WH8198> into your bosom; <WH2436> and when she saw <WH7200> that she had conceived, <WH2029> I was despised <WH7043> in her eyes: <WH5869> the LORD <WH3068> judge <WH8199> between <WH996> me and you.

But Abram <WH87> said <WH559> to Sarai, <WH8297> Behold, <WH2009> your maid <WH8198> is in your hand; <WH3027> do <WH6213> to her as it pleases <WH2896> <WH5869> you. And when Sarai <WH8297> dealt hardly <WH6031> with her, she fled <WH1272> from her face. <WH6440>
And the angel <WH4397> of the LORD <WH3068> found <WH4672> her by a fountain <WH5869> of water <WH4325> in the wilderness, <WH4057> by the fountain <WH5869> in the way <WH1870> to Shur. <WH7793>

And he said, <WH559> Hagar, <WH1904> Sarai's <WH8297> maid, <WH8198> from where <WH335> <WH2088> came <WH935> you? and where <WH575> will you go? <WH3212> And she said, <WH559> I flee <WH1272> from the face <WH6440> of my mistress <WH1404> Sarai. <WH8297>
And the angel <WH4397> of the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> to her, Return <WH7725> to your mistress, <WH1404> and submit <WH6031> yourself under <WH8478> her hands. <WH3027>
And the angel <WH4397> of the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> to her, I will multiply <WH7235> your seed <WH2233> exceedingly, <WH7235> that it shall not be numbered <WH5608> for multitude. <WH7230>

And the angel <WH4397> of the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> to her, Behold, <WH2009> you are with child <WH2030>and shall bear <WH3205> a son, <WH1121> and shall call <WH7121> his name <WH8034> Ishmael; <WH3458> because <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> has heard <WH8085> your affliction. <WH6040>

And he will be a wild <WH6501> man; <WH120> his hand <WH3027> will be against every <WH3605> man, and every <WH3605> man's hand <WH3027> against him; and he shall dwell <WH7931> in the presence <WH6440> of all his brothers. <WH251>

And she called <WH7121> the name <WH8034> of the LORD <WH3068> that spoke <WH1696> to her, You God <WH410> see <WH7210> me: for she said, <WH559> Have I also <WH1571> here <WH1988> looked <WH7200> after <WH310> him that sees <WH7210> me?
Why <WH5921> <WH3651> the well <WH875> was called <WH7121> Beerlahairoi; <WH883> behold, <WH2009> it is between <WH996> Kadesh <WH6946> and Bered. <WH1260>
And Hagar <WH1904> bore <WH3205> Abram <WH87> a son: <WH1121> and Abram <WH87> called <WH7121> his son's <WH1121> name, <WH8034> which <WH834> Hagar <WH1904> bore, <WH3205> Ishmael. <WH3458>
And Abram <WH87> was fourscore <WH8084> and six <WH8337> years <WH8141> old, <WH1121> when Hagar <WH1904> bore <WH3205> Ishmael <WH3458> to Abram. <WH87>
